title: Where do I go if someone stole my account
body: Hey guys. i was a lv 30 plat ( Májín Büü ) multiple seasons back to back. then today when i tried to log in it gave me this one that i am currently using " Rebels Doom " if i can just get the cash i spent on that account to another one. since i know i can climb ez. so can a riot please help me get my accout or money transfered{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
I've gone ahead and pulled up your ticket to get your account Májín Büü back in your hands. From what I can see, you shouldn't have any troubles getting your account back, but it may take a little longer before those agents get to your ticket just because of their queue sizes right now. Sit tight, and you'll be back on the Rift in no time! ^_^

P.S. Sweet name bruh, you keeping up with Dragon Ball Super???
